relationships.description: The music affects Harry's heart, making it feel as though it was swelling to twice its normal size.
The crimson bird interacts with the pillar by flying towards it and having flames erupt at the top of it.
Harry encounters the crimson bird, which drops a ragged bundle at his feet and lands on his shoulder.
Riddle observes the phoenix and says 'That's a phoenix...'.
Harry identifies Fawkes as being a phoenix, indicating his understanding of its significance in the story.
